action.name: Multiattack
entries: The lizardfolk makes one Bite attack and one Earthen Maul attack.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 5}, reach 5 ft. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) Piercing damage. If the target is a creature that isn't a Construct or an Undead, the lizardfolk gains {@variantrule Temporary Hit Points|XPHB} equal to the damage dealt.

action.name: Earthen Maul
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 5}, reach 5 ft. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) Bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the {@condition Prone|XPHB} condition.
